review: The Firestick was very difficult to set up.  It took several calls to technical support, and several days to get it to work properly; in the end their technical dept. made adjustments that finally permitted me to use it.  Also, the remote was very erratic when I first started to use it.  As I would use it to put in my password, I would barely touch it and it would jump 3-5  spaces--very, very frustrating, especially as I was having to repeatedly enter the password as I was working with technical support.  However several days later, it seemed to settle down and work OK.  Now that it is working, it works OK and I have enjoyed it.  I must say, customer service was very good, calling me daily after submitting my issue to their technical support
